alert.note: Alert for Southern Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 28 at 9:01PM MST until March 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet with locally up to 3 feet in the Pine Valley Mountains and near Brian Head. Strong and gusty north winds can be expected Thursday morning as snow diminishes. This may cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Southern Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected. Traction laws may be enacted.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
